bibl.title: with contributions by several authors, The Late Roman Fort at Nag el-Hagar near Kom Ombo in the Province of Thebais (Upper Egypt). Report of the First Season [2005] of the Egyptian-Swiss Joint Mission. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Dating evidence of coins and Late Roman pottery. - 3. Bauhistorische Untersuchungen. - Abstract.
bibl.seg: MACKENSEN Michael, in cooperation with Mohamed EL-BIALY, with contributions by several authors, The Late Roman Fort at Nag el-Hagar near Kom Ombo in the Province of Thebais (Upper Egypt). Report of the First Season [2005] of the Egyptian-Swiss Joint Mission. Avec résumé en anglais.
MDIK 62 (2006) pp. 161-195, 4 tabl., 1 fig., profils, 1 carte, 5 plans et pll. 33-35.
